title: ep. 20 Wonder Where We Shake
description: This week Michael and Brad discuss the album  and see how Michael reacts to a ridiculous song about New York featuring Vampire Weekend’s Ezra Koenig, Brad to a song that is so overplayed it’s triggering and much much more.

title: 2021 Feelies
description: Michael and Brad hash out their favorite albums that they listened to in 2021 in this year's feelies
michaelWYF: To Pimp a Butterfly - Kendrick Lamar
